display.title: History of science and technology (HST)
display.contributor: Society for the History of Technology.; History of Science Society.
display.publisher: Palo Alto, Calif. : Research Libraries Information Network
display.subject: Science -- History; Technology -- History; Electronic indexes; History History History History History History History History -- Africa -- East Asia -- Europe -- Latin America and Caribbean -- Middle East -- North America -- Slavic
display.description: $$Csummary$$VHST describes journal articles, conference proceedings, books, book reviews, and dissertations on the History of science and technology... Citations reflect the contents of over 600 journals, plus partial contents of several hundred more. Coverage includes all languages in which these materials are published.
display.rights: Access restricted to New York University and New School University faculty, students and staff, and to users with a valid NYU or New School IP address (*.nyu.edu or *.newschool.edu).

search.general: Suppliers: History of Science Society, Society for the History of Technology.
Description based on hypertext version as viewed over the World Wide Web; title from title screen.
HST file includes references from Isis Current Bibliography of the History of Science, 1976-present, and Current Bibliography in the History of Technology (Technology and Culture), 1987-present.
